biography: The U.S. Committee for Refugees and Immigrants (USCRI) is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization with locations in the United States, Mexico, El Salvador, Honduras, and Kenya, and a national network of nearly 200 partner agencies that provide support for those experiencing forced and voluntary displacement.
aiSummary: Eskinder Negash is a pediatrics specialist with an H-index of 11 at Addis Ababa University (Member). Has been published in Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences of the United States of America, BMJ open. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
